Package au.edu.monash.merc.capture.util.captcha

Provides image captcha implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BackgroundProducer Interface class BackgroundProducer
GimpyRenderer Interface class GimpyRenderer
NoiseProducer Class NoiseProducer
TextProducer Interface class TextProducer
WordRenderer Interface WordRenderer class
 

Class Summary
CurvedLineNoiseProducer Adds a randomly curved line to the image.
DefaultTextProducer DefaultTextProducer class implements the TextProducer interface produces the text string
DefaultWordRenderer Render a word using the given color and from a randomly selected font chosen from a list of fonts given in the constructor.
GradiatedBackgroundProducer GradiatedBackgroundProducer which implements BackgroundProducer interface provides the background of an image
ImageUtil ImageUtil class provides the filter and write an image functionalities
ImgCaptcha A builder for generating a CAPTCHA image/answer pair.
ImgCaptcha.Builder  
RippleGimpyRenderer RippleGimpyRenderer class
TransparentBackgroundProducer TransparentBackgroundProducer class which implements the BackgroundProducer interface generates a transparent background.
 

Package au.edu.monash.merc.capture.util.captcha Description

Provides image captcha implementation.
